name: Comedy Bar
description: The Comedy Bar at Silver Legacy is located just outside the Laugh Factory comedy club, making it the perfect spot for pre-show and post-show drinks. Whether you're meeting friends before a set or reliving the highlights after the show, the Comedy Bar offers a full bar with craft cocktails, beer, and wine in a relaxed atmosphere. The Laugh Factory at Silver Legacy features both established comedians and rising talent throughout the year.
shortDescription: Pre-show and post-show bar adjacent to Silver Legacy's Laugh Factory comedy club.

faqs.question: What kind of comedy shows are there?
faqs.answer: Live stand-up comedy featuring both established national acts and rising comedic talent.

faqs.question: Can I drink during the show?
faqs.answer: Yes, full bar service runs throughout every performance.

faqs.question: Is this good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Perfect for groups — the combination of comedy and drinks makes for a memorable evening after golf.

meta.description: Laugh it up at Silver Legacy's Comedy Bar. Live stand-up comedy with full bar service — perfect group entertainment after golf.
